deck.comment: in case (sth happens), if, once (sth happens, then...), when, in a short time, in one day

deck.question: 一路
deck.comment: the whole journey, all the way, going the same way, going in the same direction, of the same kind

deck.question: 遺憾
deck.comment: regret, to regret, to be sorry that

deck.question: 移動
deck.comment: to move, movement, migration, mobile, portable

deck.question: 移民
deck.comment: to immigrate, to migrate, emigrant, immigrant

deck.question: 乙
deck.comment: second of 10 heavenly stems 十天干, second in order, letter "B" or roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc, second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方, as opposed to 甲方), ethyl, bent, winding, radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)

deck.question: 議論
deck.comment: to comment, to talk about, to discuss, discussion, CL:個

deck.question: 義務
deck.comment: duty, obligation, commitment, volunteer duty, CL:項, mandatory, voluntary

deck.question: 因而
deck.comment: therefore, as a result, thus, and as a result, ...

deck.question: 銀
deck.comment: silver, silver-colored, relating to money or currency

deck.question: 迎接
deck.comment: to meet, to welcome, to greet

deck.question: 應聘
deck.comment: to accept a job offer, to apply for an advertised position

deck.question: 應用
deck.comment: to use, to apply, application, applicable

deck.question: 遊覽
deck.comment: to go sight-seeing, to tour, to visit, CL:次

deck.question: 娛樂
deck.comment: to entertain, to amuse, entertainment, recreation, amusement, hobby, fun, joy

deck.question: 與其
deck.comment: rather than..., 與其 A 不如 B (rather than A, better to B)

deck.question: 語氣
deck.comment: tone, manner of speaking, mood, CL:個

deck.question: 預訂
deck.comment: to place an order, to book ahead

deck.question: 預防
deck.comment: to prevent, to take precautions against, to protect, to guard against, precautionary, prophylactic

deck.question: 暈
deck.comment: confused, dizzy, giddy, to faint, to swoon, to lose consciousness, to pass out

deck.question: 運用
deck.comment: to use, to put to use

deck.question: 再三
deck.comment: over and over again, again and again

deck.question: 贊成
deck.comment: to approve, to endorse, (literary) to assist

deck.question: 讚美
deck.comment: to admire, to praise, to eulogize

deck.question: 糟糕
deck.comment: too bad, how terrible, what bad luck, terrible, bad

deck.question: 造成
deck.comment: to bring about, to create, to cause

deck.question: 則
deck.comment: conjunction used to express contrast with a previous sentence or clause, standard, norm, rule, to imitate, to follow, then, principle, classifier for written items (such as an official statement)

deck.question: 責備
deck.comment: to blame, to criticize, condemnation, reproach

deck.question: 摘
deck.comment: to take, to borrow, to pick (flowers, fruit etc), to pluck, to select, to remove, to take off (glasses, hat etc)

deck.question: 粘貼
deck.comment: to stick, to affix, to adhere, to paste (as in cut, copy and paste), Taiwan pr. , also written 黏貼

deck.question: 展開
deck.comment: to unfold, to carry out, to be in full swing, to launch

deck.question: 展覽
deck.comment: to put on display, to exhibit, exhibition, show, CL:個,次

deck.question: 掌握
deck.comment: to grasp (often fig.), to control, to seize (initiative, opportunity, destiny), to master, to know well, to understand sth well and know how to use it, fluency

deck.question: 召開
deck.comment: to convene (a conference or meeting), to convoke, to call together

deck.question: 針對
deck.comment: to be directed against, to be aimed at, to counter, in the light of, in connection with

deck.question: 珍惜
deck.comment: to treasure, to value, to cherish

deck.question: 陣
deck.comment: disposition of troops, wave, spate, burst, spell, short period of time, classifier for events or states of short duration

deck.question: 爭論
deck.comment: to argue, to debate, to contend, argument, contention, controversy, debate, CL:次,場

deck.question: 爭取
deck.comment: to fight for, to strive for, to win over

deck.question: 徵求
deck.comment: to solicit, to seek, to request (opinions, feedback etc), to petition

deck.question: 整體
deck.comment: whole entity, entire body, synthesis, as a whole (situation, construction, team etc), global, macrocosm, integral, holistic, whole

deck.question: 正
deck.comment: just (right), main, upright, straight, correct, positive, greater than zero, principle

deck.question: 支
deck.comment: to support, to sustain, to erect, to raise, branch, division, to draw money, classifier for rods such as pens and guns, for army divisions and for songs or compositions

deck.question: 直
deck.comment: straight, to straighten, fair and reasonable, frank, straightforward, (indicates continuing motion or action), vertical, vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters

deck.question: 執行
deck.comment: to implement, to carry out, to execute, to run

deck.question: 指導
deck.comment: to guide, to give directions, to direct, to coach, guidance, tuition, CL:個

deck.question: 指揮
deck.comment: to conduct, to command, to direct, conductor (of an orchestra), CL:個

deck.question: 制度
deck.comment: system (e.g. political, adminstrative etc), institution, CL:個

deck.question: 至今
deck.comment: so far, to this day, until now

deck.question: 至於
deck.comment: as for, as to, to go so far as to

deck.question: 治療
deck.comment: to treat, to cure, medical treatment, cure

deck.question: 秩序
deck.comment: order (orderly), order (sequence), social order, the state (of society), CL:個

deck.question: 鍾
deck.comment: clock, o'clock, time as measured in hours and minutes, bell, CL:架,座

deck.question: 中介
deck.comment: to act as intermediary, to link, intermediate, inter-, agency, agent

deck.question: 重
deck.comment: heavy, serious, to attach importance to

deck.question: 主持
deck.comment: to take charge of, to manage or direct, to preside over, to uphold, to stand for (justice etc), to host (a TV or radio program etc)

deck.question: 主張
deck.comment: to advocate, to stand for, view, position, stand, proposition, viewpoint, assertion, CL:個

deck.question: 抓緊
deck.comment: to grasp firmly, to pay special attention to, to rush in, to make the most of

deck.question: 轉變
deck.comment: to change, to transform, shift, transformation, CL:個

deck.question: 轉告
deck.comment: to pass on, to communicate, to transmit

deck.question: 裝
deck.comment: adornment, to adorn, dress, clothing, costume (of an actor in a play), to play a role, to pretend, to install, to fix, to wrap (sth in a bag), to load, to pack

deck.question: 狀態
deck.comment: state of affairs, state, mode, situation, CL:個

deck.question: 追求
deck.comment: to pursue (a goal etc) stubbornly, to seek after, to woo

deck.question: 資料
deck.comment: material, resources, data, information, profile (Internet), CL:份,個

deck.question: 資源
deck.comment: natural resource (such as water or minerals), resource (such as manpower or tourism)

deck.question: 諮詢
deck.comment: to consult, to seek advice, consultation, (sales) inquiry (formal)

deck.question: 紫
deck.comment: purple, violet, amethyst, Lithospermum erythrorhizon (flowering plant whose root provides red purple dye), Japanese: murasaki

deck.question: 自豪
deck.comment: (feel a sense of) pride, to be proud of sth (in a good way)

deck.question: 自覺
deck.comment: conscious, aware, on one's own initiative, conscientious

deck.question: 自信
deck.comment: to have confidence in oneself, self-confidence

deck.question: 綜合
deck.comment: comprehensive, composite, synthesized, to sum up, to integrate, to synthesize

deck.question: 總共
deck.comment: altogether, in sum, in all, in total

deck.question: 總算
deck.comment: at long last, finally, on the whole

deck.question: 總統
deck.comment: president (of a country), CL:個,位,名,屆

deck.question: 總之
deck.comment: in a word, in short, in brief

deck.question: 祖國
deck.comment: ancestral land CL:個, homeland, used for PRC

deck.question: 遵守
deck.comment: to comply with, to abide by, to respect (an agreement)

deck.question: 作為
deck.comment: one's conduct, deed, activity, accomplishment, achievement, to act as, as (in the capacity of), qua, to view as, to look upon (sth as), to take sth to be

deck.question: 作文
deck.comment: to write an essay, composition (student essay), CL:篇
